articles.description: The star Bulldogs midfielder is in his third season but is behind only Dustin Martin and Lance Franklin among AFL players for Instagram followers.
articles.content:
Smiths looks physique and hair footballing talents and odd combination of reserve and crafted self-marketing, have created Brand Bailey.
By the metrics of social media, hes the most marketable playe… [+3963 chars]
